plot: In the midst of dealing with his parents' imminent divorce, a young boy befriends his mysterious, elderly neighbor whose self-proclaimed dimension traveling exploits seem to promise an escape from his troubling reality.
title: Endwell
plot_es: In the midst of dealing with his parents' imminent divorce, a young boy befriends his mysterious, elderly neighbor whose self-proclaimed dimension traveling exploits seem to promise an escape from his troubling reality.
plot_en: In the midst of dealing with his parents' imminent divorce, a young boy befriends his mysterious, elderly neighbor whose self-proclaimed dimension traveling exploits seem to promise an escape from his troubling reality.
